WaveDrom
========

Google Chrome
-------------

Installation on Google Chrome is easy in the developer mode. Click the spanner
(menu). Tools -> Extensions. Then check the radiobutton Developer mode. Then
load the unpacked extension by browsing to the root folder of WaveDrom. 

It is possible to load a WaveJSON file with the omnibox just by typing in the
URL bar wavedrom <wavejson>. And subsitute the <wavejson> with your waveform.
Next time when WaveDrom is loaded the data is loaded with the localStorage from
your browser.
